metadata.title: CVE-2019-6502 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - negligible
metadata.description:
sc_context_create in ctx.c in libopensc in OpenSC 0.19.0 has a memory leak,as demonstrated by a call from eidenv.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6502` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.20.0-1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.20.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensc package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.20.0-1').
